main event: A small light colored red, blue, and white was observed moving up and down over Looming, California on 31 August 1952.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound., The sighting occurred twice between the hours of 0422 and 2522 PDT., The observers visually tracked the object from the ground., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 5,000-6,000 feet., Observers were located at specific COC posts between Newcastle and Roseville, California.
sighted object: one small light colored red, blue, and white
